Headline: #95 95th |Temporary Westbound Reroute near Burley/91st
ShortDescription: Westbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd, Buffalo and into the Terminal: due to, street blockage near Burley/91st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd, Buffalo and into the Terminal: due to, street blockage near Burley/91st.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/14th
ShortDescription: #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Roosevelt, Kostner, 16th then resume their normal route on Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Roosevelt, Kostner, 16th then resume their normal route on Pulaski, due to police activity near Pulaski/14th.

Allow extra travel time.
